message: Let's split it evenly, a fair start!
I'll take the lead, you can start next round if you don't like it!

You're getting desperate, but I'm not budging!
You're really taking advantage of me, but I'll give you one more chance!
You're getting close to nothing, don't say I didn't warn you!

You're almost out of options, don't expect mercy!
You're really trying to take everything, but I'll give you one more chance to be fair!
You're down to your last penny, don't blame me!
You're taking everything, I guess I'll just have to start over!
Fine, take this and leave me be!
